short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hover over the page with the mouse pointer and visually glance over the page for DIV tags.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hover over the page with the mouse pointer and visually glance over the page for DIV tags. No more digging in Chrome DevTools to see DIV layouts. Simply click on the DIV Glance icon and get the visual flow of DIV tags on the web page.
